rules.description: SpaceFN: Space+[hjkl] to Left, Down, Up, Right
SpaceFN: Space+[yuio] to home, page_down, page_up, end
SpaceFN: Space+[sdf] to mute, volume_down, volume_up
SpaceFN: Space+[wer] to rewind, play_or_pause, fast_forward
SpaceFN: Space+[1-9] to F[1-9], Space+0 to F10, Space+Hyphen (-) to F11, Space+Equal Sign (=) to F12
SpaceFN: Disable SpaceFN mode after last typing
